food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like me.
💛 My color is like the sun.
📏 You can peel me.

food.question: I am white, and come from a cow. You drink me to make your bones strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I am often poured into a glass.
💪 I help you grow big and strong.

food.question: I am red, round, and juicy. Doctors say one a day keeps them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a fruit.
🔴 My color is the same as fire trucks.
🦷 Good for your health.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, rabbits love to eat me. I'm good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits love me.
👓 I help you see better.
🧡 My color is the same as pumpkins.

food.question: I am a yellow spread you put on bread, made from ground nuts or seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I go well with jelly.
🥜 I am made from ground nuts.
🥪 Many sandwiches use me.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥖 I come in many shapes and sizes.
🔥 I need to be cooked to be edible.
🥪 Many cultures around the world eat me every day.

food.question: I am cold, sweet, and come in many flavors. People scream for me on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I can be eaten with a cone or a bowl.
☀️ I am popular in the summer.
👅 I melt if you don't eat me quickly!

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🌳 I resemble a small tree.
🥗 I'm often served with ranch dressing.

food.question: I am a dish made of rice, vegetables, and often meat or fish, all stir-fried together in a pan. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am often served in Chinese restaurants.
🥘 I'm a combination of many ingredients cooked together.
🥢 You can eat me with chopsticks.

food.question: I am a creamy dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic. People often eat me with pita bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I am popular in Middle Eastern cuisine.
🧄 Garlic is one of my key ingredients.
🥖 I am often eaten with pita bread or vegetables.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐾 I have soft paws and sharp claws.
🧶 I often play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I am a loyal friend and guard your house.
🎾 I like to play fetch.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I hunt other animals for food.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I'm a big grey animal with a trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears and a fluffy tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🌿 I live in a burrow.
🏃 I am known for being fast.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🐭 I eat mice and other small animals.
🌿 Some of us are venomous, but not all.

animal.question: I am a bird that can't fly but I love cold weather.

hints.text: 🐧 I waddle when I walk.
🐟 I eat fish.
🧊 I live in Antarctica.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and graze on the African savanna.

hints.text: 🦓 Each of my stripes is unique, like a fingerprint.
🐎 I look a bit like a horse.
🍃 I eat grass and leaves.

animal.question: I live in the sea, have eight arms, and can squirt ink.

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I can change color to blend in with my surroundings.
🧠 I am very intelligent.
